timeline.message: HBASE-24311 Add more details in MultiVersionConcurrencyControl STUCK log message

timeline.bodyText: Shall we use para{} log style?
timeline.author: Reidddddd

replies.bodyText: Ideally WARN level will be enabled always. That is why I thought its ok to keep this existing way. I pushed master branch already this way. If u strongly feel we need to change,  I can change. Might have to put addendum on Master. wdyt?
replies.author: anoopsjohn

replies.bodyText: I mean it's ok to keep the same, since it is already in master.
replies.author: Reidddddd
